refnamediv.refpurpose: Make unified diff of two strings.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: xdiff_string_diff makes unified diff of strings str1 and str2. context indicated how many lines of context you want to include in diff result. Set minimal to &true; if you want to minimalize size of diff (can take a long time).

note.para: This function doesn't work well with binary strings. To make diff of binary strings use xdiff_string_diff_binary.

refsect1.para: Returns string with result or &false; if an internal error happened.

example.title: xdiff_string_diff example
example.para: The following code makes unified diff of two articles.
example.programlisting:
<?php
$old_article = file_get_contents('./old_article.txt');
$new_article = $_REQUEST['article']; /* Let's say that someone pasted a new article to html form */

$diff = xdiff_string_diff($old_article, $new_article, 1);
if (is_string($diff)) {
    echo "Differences between two articles:\n";
    echo $diff;
}

?>
